pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes plus socks. After the product has been loaded into properly calibrated application equipment, shirt, pants, socks and shoes are sufficient Personal Protective Equipment. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining personal protective equipment (PPE). If no such instructions for washables, use detergent and hot water. Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry.

Safety_Information.general_Info: When used as directed, this product does not present a hazard to humans or domestic animals.
